author: Flame442 (Flame#2941)
Tomeno (Tomeno#8688)
install_msg: Use `[p]caption` to generate a caption for an image.
name: caption
description: Generate captions for images using AI, specifically the OFA model available at https://huggingface.co/spaces/OFA-Sys/OFA-Image_Caption. Most of the code is stolen from the deepfry cog by Flame442.
end_user_data_statement: Use of this cog is subject to the privacy policy of API providers, namely hf.space, at https://huggingface.co/privacy.
